short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swing past obstacles in Noob Hook, a thrilling physics-based game. Collect coins, unlock skins and challenge friends!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Noob Hook is a captivating physics-based skill game where players navigate through blocky terrains using a grappling hook. Your goal is to swing from block to block, overcoming obstacles and avoiding traps to reach the finish line. Simply drag and release your cursor or finger to shoot the grappling hook and propel your character forward. Each level challenges you to maneuver skillfully while collecting coins to unlock unique skins for your character. 

If you have any questions about our Noob Hook game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Noob Hook extension.
4. Press "Remove"
